author: @michaelharris2493
text: I have used the same platform with the Arduino and now the Raspberry PI with the Arduino this car and motors will cruise quite fast on the carpet using the same power source and motor driver. But with the Raspberry Pi and your Python script it is quite under powered. So there has to be a way to change the speed in Python. If you figure this out please let me know. I have also tried this robot with the Arduberry Hat for the Raspberry PI  and it works well. But that is programming in C, I m new to python so i would like to try it  that. .

author: @RIVvideos
text: The reason why it turns so bad, more than the motors being weak, is because of the mechanical setup. The center of turning of the wheels don't line up. It would have been better to use 2 wheels and 1 loose wheel in the back.  Besides that, awesome tutorial, thank you for posting!
